trans-unit.source: Represents a condition that compares the value of an activity member to a specified value by using a specified comparison operator.
trans-unit.target: 代表使用指定的比較運算子比較活動成員的值與指定值的條件。

trans-unit.source: You can use an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to constrain a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> or an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> 限制 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> 或 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用預設的建構函式，則必須明確設定 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You must also set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您也必須設定 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> 的預設值為 `Equals`。

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of an activity member.
trans-unit.target: 活動成員的點分隔名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value to be compared
trans-unit.target: 要比較的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> class by specifying an activity member and a value for comparison.
trans-unit.target: 指定活動成員和用於比較的值，以初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> is set to `member`, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> is set to `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> 設定為 `member`，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> 設定為 `value`。

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> 的預設值為 `Equals`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="member" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the activity member that is to be compared with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要與 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value" /> 比較的活動成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of the activity member
trans-unit.target: 活動成員的點分隔名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can specify an activity property or field, a member of an activity property or field, or a single element of an activity property or field (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定實作 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> 介面的活動屬性或欄位、活動屬性或欄位的成員，或活動屬性或欄位 (或其中之一的成員) 的單一項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a single element of a collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定集合的單一項目。

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> 的預設建構函式，則必須明確設定 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified activity member is compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 藉由套用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>，即可比較指定活動成員的值與 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates accessing the Member property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何存取 Member 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例來自＜追蹤設定檔設計工具 SDK＞範例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Tracking Profile Designer 範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 已評估條件，且 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> 是 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> is incorrectly formed.
trans-unit.target: 已評估條件，且 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> 的格式錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> does not refer to a valid activity member.
trans-unit.target: 已評估條件，且 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> 未參考有效的活動成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the operator that is used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在比較中使用的運算子。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Equals" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Equals" />。

trans-unit.source: Currently only supports `Equals` and `NotEquals`.
trans-unit.target: 目前僅支援 `Equals` 和 `NotEquals`。

trans-unit.source: The value that is to be compared with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> 比較的值。

trans-unit.source: The value used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 比較中使用的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> is compared to the value of
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> 和

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> 的值會在套用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> 後進行比較。

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> 的預設建構函式，則必須明確設定 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates accessing the Value property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何存取 Value 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例來自＜追蹤設定檔設計工具 SDK＞範例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Tracking Profile Designer 範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。
